items.sentence: If I were you, the first thing I would say to Tom is thank you.
Tom accepted a lower-paying job than what he was qualified for.

If our sun is a dwarf star, imagine how big the others must be.
French was the only language that I spoke until I was thirteen.
Tom wasn't hiding behind the door. He was hiding in the closet.
Tom started playing the trumpet when he was thirteen years old.
Mary and Alice were cheerleaders when they were in high school.
Maybe we should all sit down and try to talk about this calmly.
I can't help you now. Maybe I can help you do that later today.
